entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 early this morning then south 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 05 February 2023
